• You can now copy values that are in the user profile
• You can now see the contact information added by a lead in a conversation

• Copying text from the conversation view's message bubbles has been fixed. Touch and briefly hold message bubbles to see the copy option.

• Copying text from the conversation view's message bubbles has been fixed. Touch and briefly hold message bubbles to see the copy option.

• Conversations now show if a user or lead has seen a message.
• We've added full support for split views on the iPad and iPhone Plus.
• Fixed a crash that could happen while copying the contents of a message bubble.

• Fixed a layout issue with the conversation view on iPads when hardware keyboards are being used.
• Fixed a bug where messages sent to users weren't being marked as seen until after the user had replied.
• Opening conversations from links or push notifications on iPad no longer reloads as it's opening the linked message.
• Fixed a crash that could happen while removing tags from a user profile.

• Fixed a bug where messages sent to users weren't being marked as seen until after the user had replied.
• Opening conversations from links or push notifications on iPad no longer reloads as it's opening the linked message.
• Fixed a crash that could happen while removing tags from a user profile.

• Fixed a bug where long lists of saved replies could time out or fail to load.

Show customers when your team's available with office hours! You can now let your customers know when you’re open and working when they contact you via the Intercom Messenger. Away mode can be turned on via the side profile menu in the Intercom web app and from the side menu of the iOS app.

Show customers when your team's available with office hours! You can now let your customers know when you’re open and working when they contact you via the Intercom Messenger. Away mode can be turned on via the side profile menu in the Intercom web app and from the side menu of the iOS app.

Scan conversations more easily. We’ve made it easier for you and your team to prioritize conversations by adding indicators that tell you when a conversation is new or unread.

• Now you can control your notifications settings from inside the app. Go to the new Settings option in the menu to change them. 
• Edit your profile, control away mode and ask us a question or leave us some feedback, all from the new settings screen.

• Snooze conversations on your own terms with custom snooze timers.

We've streamlined the app's navigation in this version! We've removed the old left-hand hamburger menu and in its place is a new, cleaner tab bar which splits the app into three sections:

- People
- Inboxes & Mentions
- Settings

Switch inboxes and view your mentions by going to the inbox tab and touching the inbox name in the top bar.

The app now contains our new Messenger Home, making it easier get help quickly outside of starting a conversation.
You can use the Messenger Home to quickly access relevant help articles, review pinned content, and view product status in real time.

In this update, we've improved the way that you insert articles into conversations:

* We improved the article search UI.
* We fixed a crash that could happen when inserting an article into a conversation.
